description:
Vovsoft Webcam Capture is a very simple webcam snapshot software that enables you to monitor your cam from a streamlined, minimalist user interface. It offers various visual effects and can help you modify video properties.

Vovsoft Webcam Capture is a very simple webcam snapshot software that enables you to monitor your cam from a streamlined, minimalist user interface.
It offers various visual effects and can help you modify video properties.
You can click "Start" button and here you go.
You can easily change your webcam device properties using the software.
It also supports full screen view, rotate, flip vertical and flip horizontal.

Key Features:
* Capture picture
* Capture video (webcam recorder)
* Show video only
* Full screen
* Rotate (0째, 90째, 180째, 270째)
* Mirror Horizontal
* Stay on top
* Apply various effects
* Automatic photo taking at certain seconds
* Select quality (resolution)
* Freeze
* Mirror Vertical
